item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk: If there's going to be fraud, it should at least be domestic. ‚ÄúBy the way, it's really ea...
item.description: Elon Musk: If there's going to be fraud, it should at least be domestic. ‚ÄúBy the way, it's really easy to take advantage of the federal government. It's very easy. It looks like in terms of the Covid payments, there was something like $200 billion of Covid payment fraud taken by fraudsters out of the country. Listen, if there's going to be fraud, it should at least be domestic. So, you know, but they managed to get $200 billion out of the country. I'm like, what? Didn't we notice that?‚Äù From: CPAC Interview, February 20, 2025

item.title: @elonmusk: The same man indicted for laundering over a million dollars in the Feeding Our Future scam now owns ...
item.description: The same man indicted for laundering over a million dollars in the Feeding Our Future scam now owns homes running assisted living facilities that the state is paying. That alone should trigger alarms. The state should already be cross referencing indictments across programs and pausing payouts. In my opinion, this is basic accountability.

item.title: @elonmusk: We reported on a@IlhanOmarconnected cash-for-ballots harvesting scheme. A Minnesota harvester boaste...
item.description: We reported on a@IlhanOmarconnected cash-for-ballots harvesting scheme. A Minnesota harvester boasted harvesting HUNDREDS of 2020 absentee ballots ILLEGALLY! ‚ÄúNumbers do not lie...these here are all absentee ballots‚Ä¶my car is full‚Ä¶‚Äù Jail must come!

item.title: @elonmusk: Free speech is a fundamental value in the United States, but if you look at the data, it's clear tha...
item.description: Free speech is a fundamental value in the United States, but if you look at the data, it's clear that white people are the ones who value it most. The fewer white people there are in the U.S., the less central free speech will be to American culture.

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok for Business is officially here It brings real-time intelligence into organizations with enterp...
item.description: Grok for Business is officially here It brings real-time intelligence into organizations with enterprise-grade security and control, while staying true to its core principle: truth-first AI ‚Ä¢ Admin controls for teams, access, and usage ‚Ä¢ Live information + deep reasoning, not stale answers ‚Ä¢ Designed for decision-making, research, analysis, and operations ‚Ä¢ Your business data is NOT used to train models ‚Ä¢ Built to scale from small teams to large enterprises Enterprise adds SSO, directory sync, and advanced security controls
